channel.title: SRL Backup
channel.description: In case the SRL server goes down again, you can download a copy of every public SRL revision here: http://freddy1990.com/snapshots/srl/

item.title: SRL Backup
item.dc:creator: @Freddy1990 Freddy1990
item.description:
@Freddy1990 wrote:

[quote=“IP-Drowner, post:4, topic:223123”][quote author=Freddy1990 link=topic=293056.msg2361503#msg2361503 date=1217634092]

In case the SRL server goes down again, you can download a copy of every public SRL revision here:
http://freddy1990.com/snapshots/srl/

And if you don’t know what the latest version is (which would make you really stupid :P): http://freddy1990.com/snapshots/srl/current.php

Good idea. I was thinking of something similar too But i’d say it’ll be towards the middle of August before the site shuts down again, so you better start getting the latest revisions near then

My server backs up every new revision within 15 minutes of being committed…
[/quote]
WTH!??? Your server has, like, everything! How the hell could it backup a revision as it can’t check the SvN? Or does it connect to that server?

I dunno![/quote]
I wrote a php script for it…

Read full topic

item.title: SRL Backup
item.dc:creator: @IP-Drowner IP-Drowner
item.description:
@IP-Drowner wrote:

[quote=“Freddy1990, post:3, topic:223123”][quote author=IP-Drowner link=topic=293056.msg2360607#msg2360607 date=1217576980]

In case the SRL server goes down again, you can download a copy of every public SRL revision here:
http://freddy1990.com/snapshots/srl/

And if you don’t know what the latest version is (which would make you really stupid :P): http://freddy1990.com/snapshots/srl/current.php

Good idea. I was thinking of something similar too But i’d say it’ll be towards the middle of August before the site shuts down again, so you better start getting the latest revisions near then
[/quote]
My server backs up every new revision within 15 minutes of being committed…[/quote]
WTH!??? Your server has, like, everything! How the hell could it backup a revision as it can’t check the SvN? Or does it connect to that server?

I dunno!

Read full topic
